snippet.title: Wizard's Terror Trailer | My First Full Game | Mrp1
snippet.description:
Available at: https://mrp1.itch.io/wizards-terror and https://gamejolt.com/games/wizards-terror/555888 
Wizard's terror, an Action platformer where you will go on an adventure to fight the Evil Wizard!

Go through 3 different areas with various enemies, levels getting bigger as you progress!

A tutorial and Signs over all levels to help you be guided throughout the game.

Upgrade your Damage, Health and Ranged Damage in Shop with the gold you earn from killing enemies, which are all saved incase you close your game.

Multiple types of arrows to kill the enemies the wizard spread over the kingdom.

This is the first full game I have developed, hope you like it!

Feedback would definitely be appreciated. Thank you.

- Mrp1.
